column5: No such thing as winternet when you go snowmobiling every weekend all winter !!!!  Awesome....

Above norm temps for the next three months.  I heard just the opposite Brian, guy I was listening to said this winter would be colder than normal with above average snowfall.  It'd be nice if  weather forecasters could be even close to the same story.

I heard just the opposite Brian, guy I was listening to said this winter would be colder than normal with above average snowfall.  It'd be nice if  weather forecasters could be even close to the same story.   Lew,if Im posting river stuff,alls good.  If Im postings ice fishing,well,I,ll be cozy in my new suit and eskimo hut.  Hell,you might even join me one day. We can roast dogs and warm a can a bushbeans.LOL  Either way,I,ll be comfortable.
Makes mental note to send Sinker to Nunavut for the winter. I'll help with the funding..but only if it's a one way ticket.
No such thing as winternet when you go snowmobiling every weekend all winter !!!! Awesome.... Yup, that'll beat the winter blues!
I was on my way to town today and I saw this,    looks like the wild life knows more about what's coming than we do. are they ready to tough out a long cold spell
Awesome.
At least they'll have TV for the bad days lol.
I'm praying for a long cold, snowy winter. We haven't had one for years! Last year was ok for snow, but it wasn't cold!  S.
I'm praying for a long cold, snowy winter. We haven't had one for years! Last year was ok for snow, but it wasn't cold!  S. Hope your snowblower eats a toronto yellow pages book..
I use a plow LOL......haven't needed the blower for years. Still maintain it and have it handy tho.........  S.
I liked last winter,not a lot of snow,and not too too cold .peeeeeeeeeeerfect!
Yup I'm ready for a long cold winter !!!!
Shane,SHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH    As much as I love the winter bye,Im getting long for warmer winters.  Bones ache.
lol
I'm praying for a long cold, snowy winter. We haven't had one for years! Last year was ok for snow, but it wasn't cold!  S. You can have cold OR snowy. You can't have both. It doesn't work that way.
I will take 3 months in the Caribbean.!!!! Anybody that wants a long cold snowy winter needs some help!!!! LOL
I will take 3 months in the Caribbean.!!!! Anybody that wants a long cold snowy winter needs some help!!!! LOL
Gettin' my ice auger sharpened up for sure!!! Need to look for a pop-up ice hut though.If you live in Canada you might as well get used to winter!!LOL
I bet they watch the nature channel!  I'm hesitant for winter this year as its my first year owning property...it'll be nothing like the easy days at the Condo.
Beaver watchin beaver...who knew? Lol. Me personally I'm itching for some good ol hard water fishing again this year after about a 15 year layoff. BRING IT ON!!!

I'm not looking forward to the oil bills..  Specially now that we've got a kid, and actually have to keep the house warm!  Still though.  I LOVE the winter.  Every Canadian should.  It sure beats being negative about it!
Got a call from my buddy in Florida today, he said it had cooled down to 85 F . gotta feel sorry for  a guy having to put up with such cold temps.

I'll take the snowy over deep cold any winter. If I want hardware I'll go as far up north until I find it the first of January. I do miss the ice fishing for the last 10 years. Then around the middle of January I'll keep in touch by looking at the tablet after a round of golf sitting by the pool. Then I'll hit the Snook off the pier after supper, or Sea Trout or Amber Jack or ........ That should be hardware, this touch tablet thing is acting up again and I can't edit. Only on this site for some reason.
yeah, I'm getting ready, there's lots of things to be done around the house, but here's what I was working on this afternoon

Ok, I want it to get real cold for a few weeks, then get a HUGE dump of snow for a few days, then back to real cold again so the snow stays. I don't like when it snows one day, and rains the next, then gets cold.....  S.

Ok, I want it to get real cold for a few weeks, then get a HUGE dump of snow for a few days, then back to real cold again so the snow stays. I don't like when it snows one day, and rains the next, then gets cold.....  S.  Makes mental note to send Sinker to Nunavut for the winter.

this thread should be locked  using 4 letter woulds     snow   cold    can you even say that here  lets wait another month or so to speak the words and sing the traditional songs   oh winter net oh winter  net

Thats a good sized doghouse Chris I'd prefer a cold winter. At least it makes good ice and one can travel on the lake.That half rain/snow type weather is no good for anything.Too much snow also makes for slush on the lakes and that can be a real pain in the butt.
No winter net this year,,,,,,,,  Above norm temps for the next three months.  Sorry,me fault. New floater suit.
